com.esri.mo2.data.omc
Interface RemoteQuery

public interface RemoteQuery

Defines additional data for a RemoteFeatureClass when it is queried by the TileCache. More than just a QueryFilter, a RemoteQuery provides a way for the RemoteFeatureClass to cancel a current retrieval - usually because of some problem when receiving data from the remote server.

See Also:
RemoteFeatureClass.retrieve(com.esri.mo2.data.omc.RemoteQuery)

Method Summary
 void cancel()
          Cancels the current retrieving process.
 QueryFilter getQueryFilter()
          Returns the query filter that is associated with the receivable.
 double getScale()
          Returns the scale at which the features should be generalized.
 Object getUserObject()
          Returns the user object specified when the TileCache.fetch() method is invoked.

getUserObject

public Object getUserObject()
Returns the user object specified when the TileCache.fetch() method is invoked. It can be used to track retrievals.

Returns:
the user object
See Also:
TileCache.fetch(com.esri.mo2.data.omc.RemoteFeatureClass, double, com.esri.mo2.cs.geom.Polygon, java.lang.Object)
